description: A simple overview of the most important Docker host and container metrics. (cAdvisor/Prometheus)

targets.expr: min((node_filesystem_size_bytes {job="node-exporter", instance=~".*9100", device=~"/dev/mapper/vg-root", mountpoint!="/var/lib/docker/aufs"} - node_filesystem_free_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance=~".*9100", device=~"/dev/mapper/vg-root", mountpoint!="/var/lib/docker/aufs"}) / node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance=~".*9100", device=~"/dev/mapper/vg-root", mountpoint!="/var/lib/docker/aufs"} )

title: Docker and system monitoring
